item.proviorigins.lily_of_the_void: Lily of the Void Origin Icon
death.attack.freshwater.player: %1$s lost too much salt whilst fighting %2$s
death.attack.freshwater.item: %1$s lost too much salt trying to deal with %2$s's %3$s
death.attack.kraken_soul_steal.item: %1$s had their soul stolen by %2$s using %3$s
death.attack.void_corrupted.player: %1$s succumbed to the void whilst fighting %2$s
death.attack.void_corrupted.item: %1$s succumbed to the void whilst fighting %2$s using %3$s
death.attack.bad_dimension.player: %1$s returned to the void with help from %2$s
death.attack.bad_dimension.item: %1$s returned to the void with help from %2$s using %3$s
tooltip.proviorigins.voidlily.grants_bli: Consume to inflict blindness on struck entities.
tooltip.proviorigins.voidlily.grants_cor: Consume to enhance your latent poison with the void.
tooltip.proviorigins.voidlily.grants_tho: Consume to gain thorns, damaging attackers.
tooltip.proviorigins.voidlily.grants_wea: Consume to inflict weakness on struck entities.
tooltip.proviorigins.voidlily.grants_wit: Consume to inflict wither on struck entities.
tooltip.proviorigins.drakling.dragon_hea: Wear the flesh of your ancestors and gain their strength.
power.proviorigins.common.brittle.name: Brittle Body
power.proviorigins.common.amphibious.des: You can breathe in both air and water.
power.proviorigins.common.taller.name: Large Body
power.proviorigins.common.taller.desc: You are taller than most with a height of 3 blocks.
power.proviorigins.common.slow_swim.name: Poor Swimmer
power.proviorigins.common.no_game_events: None of your actions emit vibrations.
power.proviorigins.common.slow_fall.name: Slow Descent
power.proviorigins.common.slow_fall.desc: Sneaking in the air slows your descent.
power.proviorigins.common.exhaust_more.d: Your hunger depletes 50% faster than others.
power.proviorigins.common.double_fire_da: You take double damage from fire and lava.
power.proviorigins.common.no_food.name: Pure Calcium
power.proviorigins.common.no_food.desc: You cannot eat food except for milk.
power.proviorigins.common.no_splash_poti: You are unaffected by potion clouds, including splash and lingering potions.
power.proviorigins.common.no_crits.name: Imprecise
power.proviorigins.common.no_crits.desc: You cannot perform critical hits with your attacks.
power.proviorigins.common.smaller.name: Small Body
power.proviorigins.common.smaller.desc: You are smaller than most and have a height of 1.15 blocks.
Your melee hits deal 33% less damage.
power.proviorigins.voidlily.name: Lily of the Void
power.proviorigins.voidlily.description: Grown from a Void Flower rooted on the skybox, you are connected both to nature and to oblivion.
power.proviorigins.voidlily.floral_mimic: You may gain mimicry of any compatible plant held in your main hand, consuming the plant in the process. Mimicries grant buffs and last for a duration, until death, or until overridden by another mimicry.
power.proviorigins.voidlily.floral_reset:
You have natural mimicry of lilies, inflicting poison upon struck entities whilst no other mimicry is active.
At any time you may forgo your current mimicry and return to this default state.
power.proviorigins.voidlily.nether_air.d: The fabric of the Nether disagrees with you, preventing you from breathing whilst there.
Nearby bees pollinate you, granting saturation but blinding you in the process.
Gain strength, speed, air, and saturation when in The End or within 4 blocks of Bedrock, portals, or 4 blocks of Crying Obsidian.
power.proviorigins.decaykraken.name: Kraken of Decay
power.proviorigins.decaykraken.descripti: A vagrant kraken strays from death, still grasping onto its remnant power.
power.proviorigins.decaykraken.evolved.d: Slaying the Wither threefold has enhanced your connection to death, granting you access to new skills and an immunity to freshwater.
power.proviorigins.decaykraken.deaths_vi: Gain access to a resource called Death's Vice that drains slowly over time.
Suffer from darkness when Death's Vice reaches zero.
Gain 0.5 bars of Death's Vice when killing an entity.
Suffer weakness and slowness when Death's Vice is below 25%.
Regain Death's Vice when within 5 blocks of any form of soul fire or when holding a soul lantern in your hand. This bonus is increased in the Nether and further increased in Soul Sand Valleys.
For quality of life purposes, you may craft Soul Lanterns into a unique version that cannot be placed but grants the same held effects.
power.proviorigins.decaykraken.ink_prope: Expel a cloud of ink to boost yourself in the direction you're facing. This ability is much stronger in water.
power.proviorigins.decaykraken.soul_stea: Charge a short-ranged beam of soul energy, if it hits an entity inflict damage and heal yourself.
power.proviorigins.decaykraken.soulsand_: Killing an undead mob whilst standing on coarse dirt will convert it into soul sand.
power.proviorigins.decaykraken.water_glo: Gain a glow when submerged in water.
power.proviorigins.decaykraken.water_sen: Sources of freshwater are harmful to you and will drain Death's Vice over time before damaging your health.
Freshwater is any Overworld body of water outside of an ocean or beach biome.
Water Protection enchantments will delay this effect.
power.proviorigins.decaykraken.wither_hi: When Death's Vice is above 6 bars, striking a target consumes half a bar to inflict Wither for 6 seconds.
power.proviorigins.decaykraken.slow_on_l: You move slightly slower on land.
power.proviorigins.decaykraken.tentacle_: Extend a tentacle to grab an entity up to 12 blocks away, pulling them towards you and inflicting slow.
power.proviorigins.decaykraken.soul_cons: Consume an item that holds a soul. Death's Vice restores based on the strength of the soul held in the item.

Weak souls grant 0.25 bars of Death's Vice.
Medium souls grant 1 bar of Death's Vice.
Perfect souls will refill your Death's Vice completely.
power.proviorigins.drakling.name: Drakling
power.proviorigins.drakling.description: An emergent dragon, immature and yet brimming with potential.
power.proviorigins.drakling.evolved.name: Drake
power.proviorigins.drakling.evolved.desc: The head of your predecessor has enhanced your growth, you alone soar as the ruler of these skies.
power.proviorigins.drakling.dragon_evolu: Wear a dragon head to begin your evolution.
power.proviorigins.drakling.enderdragon_: The Ender Dragon beckons for you. Your flight stamina decreases rapidly when attempting to flee the dragon.
power.proviorigins.drakling.short_flight: You have natural Elytra wings, but your wings are imperfect, allowing flight only in short bursts.
You have natural Elytra wings, now perfected you can fly freely and boost yourself in the air.
Your newfound strength allows you to wear stronger armor, but your bodily heat loosens the material and makes it weaker than normal.
power.proviorigins.drakling.ridable.name: Mountable
power.proviorigins.drakling.ridable.desc: Your strength allows you to carry other players. Other players may press [USE] on you to mount you; you may pick up other players by pressing [USE] on them whilst sneaking.
power.proviorigins.drakling.ridable.badg: You cannot carry players in combat with you nor players who already have passengers.
power.proviorigins.jellysculk.name: Jelly Sculk
power.proviorigins.jellysculk.break_scul: You can break sculk very quickly, even with your bare hands.
power.proviorigins.jellysculk.buffs_on_s: You gain buffs whilst standing on sculk.
power.proviorigins.jellysculk.create_sen: You can spend experience to grow a sculk sensor on top of a sculk block.
[USE] with an empty hand while sneaking to activate.
power.proviorigins.jellysculk.debuffs_of: You are afflicted with darkness when not standing on sculk.
power.proviorigins.jellysculk.entity_det: You can only see entities around you through their vibrations. Sculk Sensors and Shriekers can also extend their signals to you, revealing entities they detect.
Team members and tamed animals are always visible.
power.proviorigins.jellysculk.spread_scu: You can spend experience points to spread sculk to any sculk replaceable block.
[USE] with an empty hand while sneaking to activate.
power.proviorigins.jellysculk.catalyse.d: Occasionally spread sculk veins when gaining experience.
power.proviorigins.splinter.name: Splinter
power.proviorigins.splinter.description: A fragile warrior, but a master of deception and fragmentation. The Splinter uses summoned clones of themself and trickery to survive.
You glow based on the amount of mana you currently have.
power.proviorigins.splinter.fragment.des: Summon a clone of yourself at your current location. Summoning clones uses concentration instead of mana.
power.proviorigins.splinter.fragment.bad:
Clones inherit your equipment and will fight for you.
Press [USE] on a clone to 'sit' them like an animal.
power.proviorigins.splinter.resources.de: You have access to a mana resource with which to cast spells and concentration to summon clones.
power.proviorigins.splinter.distortion.d: Blind enemies within a 16 block radius, become untargetable, and create mirror images of yourself and your clones.
power.proviorigins.splinter.swap.name: Misdirection
power.proviorigins.splinter.swap.desc: Swap places with the clone you are looking at, or if sneaking swap places with the furthest clone within 32 blocks.
power.proviorigins.faemoth.name: Faerie Moth
power.proviorigins.faemoth.description: The fae live with nature, adapting to it. This creature chose the likeness of a moth.
power.proviorigins.faemoth.faerie_dust.d: Your moth-like body produces a magical powder when near appropriate light sources. Being in direct sunlight or too far from light will erode the powder.
power.proviorigins.faemoth.faerie_dust.b: Artificial fire-related light sources such as torches, campfires, and lanterns allow you to produce Faerie Dust.
Torches and lanterns held by yourself or other nearby players will also apply to this power.
For quality of life purposes, you may craft Lanterns into a unique version that cannot be placed but grants the same held effects.
power.proviorigins.faemoth.flutter.name: Flutter
power.proviorigins.faemoth.flutter.desc: Use your wings to boost yourself into the air: you have mid-air jumps.
Critical strikes with a sword will lace an opponent with a layer faerie dust. A target that has three layers on them at once will be put to sleep for a few seconds.

Sleep is a new status effect that disables an entity's movement, strength, and vision.
Entities with Sleep take double damage, but the effect is then immediately removed.
Costs 1.5 bars of Faerie Dust per layer.
power.proviorigins.faemoth.share_buffs.d: Share speed, strength, and regeneration effects that you currently have with all allies in an 8 block radius.
